Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to explore a mutually beneficial arrangement.

We propose to offer you the chance to own this exceptional product at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to ensuring that such a valuable asset finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates its true worth and can make the most of its capabilities.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product to enhance your endeavors.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
